definition: only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Famine here is very serious. The government has already given out relieving grain to this area.
sentences.chinese: 此地糧荒嚴重，政府已經在調撥救濟糧了。

sentences.english: We came off relief grain shortly after liberation.
sentences.chinese: 解放後不久，我們就不喫救濟糧了。
